phrases: He is as scary a dad as I imagined.
He is absolutely in the right.
But some things matter more than being right.
I never thought he would bring up transferring.
Now I really cannot afford to fail.
I am sorry for getting you caught up in our family matters.
I do not want to transfer.
But that is not my concern.
Whether it is your circumstances, or your family's circumstances,
or your previous school, or this transfer ultimatum...
I am going to do as I please.
And I am going to make you all pass!
I am going to make you all graduate with your heads held high.
That is all I am thinking about!
I have my promise with Father,
but unless I can pass this exam and move on to the next grade,
Passing is not my only goal on this exam.
I decided back on that day that I would beat my sisters.
Do not think about anything else.
I need to focus on passing.
I have kept messing up until now.
But please, gods of studying, give me your strength this time.
We all worked so hard together!
We have two months until final exams.
Let us get started with our lessons, everyone!
And find out for us what we need to do to pass the exams!
I am glad you are enthusiastic.
Our goal is to get over 30 percent!
Maybe he is been reading something dirty.
She is been force feeding me chocolates lately for some reason.
Hey, I have been craving something sweet.
I am not giving you any.
Have all of these and tell me what you think.
What kind of punishment is this?
You must have a good idea of Futaro-kun's tastes by now.
I do not like sweet stuff, so I do not know what to do.
This is the safe kind of skull icon.
What is a safe kind of skull icon?
Why do not you try a simpler recipe?
I am not particularly good at cooking, either.
I know someone who is a great cook.
Why do not you have them teach you?
We are a week into the third term.
We have a Sunday to work with.
Now's the time to buckle down.
So why is not Itsuki here?!
It is that day for her.
You sure are insensitive, are not you?
Well, it is hard to talk about, but...
Is it more important than exams?
If it is not, I will kill her.
No, it is the day Mother died.
But wait, she was your mother, too.
To be accurate, it is not today.
She is devoted to visiting her grave every month on the fourteenth.
Itsuki, is that really the only reason?
Am I ever going to be like you, Mother?
Hey, I do not see other people here often.
Sorry, you look so much like Sensei, I thought you were her.
But thinking about it, she is been dead for a long time.
That is not a nice thing to say in front of her daughter, huh?
There must be a reason we bumped into each other here.
I will buy you as much as you like, to show my appreciation for your mother.
I have lost count of how many times she smacked me.
Could you please tell me what kind of person my mother was?
It was only five years ago.
I only know how my mother was at home.
I want to know what kind of person she was as a teacher.
She never tried to be nice to students.
I never saw her smile at school.
The students must have been terrified of her, then.
Believe it or not, we were not.
She could be as fierce and expressionless as she pleased.
Hell, we loved her for it.
Sensei was just that damn super beautiful.
She even had a fan club.
The boys at school were utterly smitten.
Given how much you resemble her, you are probably popular, too.
Anyway, she was so pretty that even I fell for her.
We delinquents revered her for her expressionless wallops.
But there was always a certain righteousness to it.
We would eventually fall in love with more than just her appearance.
All I remember of her for the entire year was how she scolded us.
I would not have wanted to be a teacher or become a cram school instructor.
You have helped me come to a decision, Shimoda-san.
If I can follow in my mother's footsteps, just like you did,
It is great that you admire your mother.
And there is nothing wrong with trying to become like someone you admire.
That is what I did, too.
But you are not just trying to become your mother, are you?
There are plenty of other ways to do that.
That said, no one has the right to tell you what what your dreams should be.
Go for it, if there is a reason you want to become a teacher.
What are you doing all by yourself?
I thought you had a study group at school today.
Wait, are you the person she was talking about?
Now she will have no trouble giving him V-Day chocolates.
As dense as he is, even Futaro-kun's sure to be surprised.
Why did I end up liking him?
What the heck are you doing?
Yotsuba said she forgot her reference book at home, so I am here to get it.
O-Oh, I think I threw that away the other day.
I will go buy another one.
Who is going to enjoy anything like this?
You are a double whammy of bad taste buds and bad with your hands.
Just give up and buy some chocolates from the store.
They say love is the best ingredient, though.
All that matters is that you made it.
Besides, it is a bit endearing if it is not perfect.
This one's cute, like a bug!
Futaro will not eat my food lately.
And I know I am not good at it.
I want to make chocolates that he cannot resist.
I would like you to teach me.
You are turning up the heat too much.
And you used dairy cream without heating it up first, did not you?
You are such a pain, you know that?
How to Become A Good Teacher
I have not decided to buy it yet.
You want to become a good teacher, huh?
Do not be shy about it.
I will buy it for you along with the reference book.
We might really end up failing this time.
I do not have much left in savings, too.
But if it will make Futaro-kun happy...
This is not a healthy relationship.
If we were to start going out,
I could totally see myself spoiling him by spending on him all the time.
So I have to give up on him.
Yeah, that is the right call.
I hit it back at the apartment.
It does not hurt that much, so do not worry.
I guess this side of him is exactly why.
And he keeps doing this when I know I should not fall any harder for him!
The point here is not to answer with what the author is thinking.
It is to write what you, as the readers, feel.
Damn it, we have hit a wall.
What is it that I felt?
I did think we would come to this point eventually.
This is my limit as someone who does not have the nous of a teacher.
I do not know what it is that they do not know!
I do not know how to teach them!
How cruel it is that our IQs must differ so!
I am just guessing, but I have a feeling he is thinking something rude.
I do not think we can focus anymore, let alone answer these questions.
We have been studying nonstop for days.
Let us take the afternoon off.
Let us ride that one next!
She says she is in the washroom with a stomach ache.
Why does not she just say so?
Just how many laps are you doing?
I thought I was doing a good job hiding.
The ribbon was out of the bag!
I thought I could keep going, since I have more stamina than the others.
Also, the secret is that I am the biggest dummy of the five of us.
We spent money to come to the amusement park.
You do not have any idea how dumb I am.
Do you know why we transferred to this school?
Our high school was what you would call a prestigious one.
It was not unusual for people to be held back a year if they failed an exam.
Do not make it sound natural!
We were given a chance to retake the exams, so we all tried our best.
You were the only one who failed?
Yotsuba was the only one who failed.
They all came along with me.
They never so much as frowned.
Is that from what you were taught about staying together?
That is helped them through tough times,
but it is certainly shackling them as well.
Let me study as much as I can.
I do not want to drag the others down anymore.
I told you, we are taking the day off.
That said, we have nothing to do for the remaining half of the lap.
I am going to make sure you understand that Japanese passage from earlier.
The other girls had so much trouble here.
When you said man-to-man, you did not mean mouth-to-mouth, did you?
What happened on New Year's was an accident!
I am beginning to see the light.
If someone can help me, I think we can make it work.
Could you, uh, dumb that down for me?
You will teach Japanese with me.
I have always known from your exam results that you each have different areas of expertise.
Miku is good at Socials Studies.
And you, Yotsuba, are good at Japanese.
You do not have to do anything special.
Just say what is on your mind.
If you can do it, the other four can, too.
I can be useful to everyone, even if I am stupid?
Sorry you are having to make up for my failings as a teacher.
From now on, we will all be teachers and students together.
There is something an idiot like me can do?
Yeah, there is a job only you can do.
I am not just going to drag everyone down?
you will be pulling everyone forward.
I will make sure the others pass!
Do not forget that you are the biggest danger.
You really do come here every month.
Your plan to have everyone be a tutor is showing positive signs.
I realized you can learn some things better by teaching than by being taught.
Are you telling me you do not need me anymore?
I am appreciating what you taught us.
How does it feel to be thanked by someone you taught?
Wow, that makes so much sense.
I want to cherish that feeling.
Mother, I am going to work toward becoming a teacher.
It took me all night to make chocolates.
You and Nino both stay in bed way too late.
I wish you would told me you were coming over.
I am glad you are here, though.
Miku, there is something I should let you know.
What do you mean by that?
The mock exam we did the other day, of course!
I am beginning to see some hope!
I am going to keep trying.
Are not you giving Futaro any chocolates?
I mean, I would feel bad for him if no one did.
I thought about buying him some.
But I figured it is all good if you are going to.
What do you mean, all good?
Futaro does not see us as girls at all.
I have always known it, but to him,
That is why I made up my mind.
I am going to pass this final exam.
And I am going to get the highest scores of all of us.
And if I can gain confidence and graduate from being his student,
I am going to really tell him that I have feelings for him.
If that is your way of keeping yourself disciplined...
I am sure you can do it.
I am not going to wait for you.
I cannot be slacking off either, though.
I should sleep and continue tomorrow.
These times are not going to last forever.
I feel vindicated for the first time.
These are the highest scores I have ever gotten.
I just barely passed with a total score of 184, though.
I am going to have to work on the subjects that I nearly failed.
I knew you could do it, Miku.
I knew you had the most potential.
What was your total score, Ichika?
Have as much as you like.
I will deduct the bill from Uesugi-kun's pay.
Oh, boss, you are so funny.
We are still missing one person, though.
The girl with the pigtails came earlier and left this with me.
Also, she had a message for you.
I have no more use for you now.
This is a celebration for everyone.
I am going to go get Nino.
